availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Quinn (Franklin County carriage maker, Justice of the Peace, and Frankfort Police Judge)

body.p: Franklin County carriage maker, Justice of the Peace, and Frankfort Police Judge. New York native. Carriage maker in Frankfort in 1860. Member of a sanitary committee for the United States Army in 1862. Franklin County Justice of the Peace until 1865. Frankfort Police Judge in 1865.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-007-0436; KYR-0001-028-0069; KYR-0001-004-1332; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 1, p. 101; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 38.
